episode.title: Ticor Title Insurance Company v. Brown

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: I have the opinion of the Court to announce in No. 93-1988, Ticor Title Insurance Company versus Brown.
In a Per Curiam opinion filed with the Clerk this morning, it is ordered that the writ be dismissed as improvidently granted.
Justice O'Connor has filed a dissenting opinion in which I and Justice Kennedy have joined.
